text:
An IOException should be thrown if an attempt is made to write to a JspWriter
object that has been closed.

*****************************
<html>
<title>positiveClose</title>
<body>
<% out.println("hello"); %>
<% out.close(); %>
<% out.println("hello"); %>
</body>
</html>
*****************************
